work.name: Avenue Road Property Management
work.summary: At Avenue Road, my role is to aggregate and analyze historical and forecast weather data using Python (pandas) to produce weekly reports, including detailed weather and snow forecasts.
highlights: Delivered 8 detailed forecasts per month, aiding in data-driven decision making for clients.
Maintained a database of thousands of weather records, ensuring consistency and reliability for models.

work.name: GeoBC
work.summary: In my second summer at GeoBC, I Independently researched and implemented new methods for storing archival geospatial data on Amazon S3, served via GeoServer. Additionally, I developed an ArcGIS Pro tool in Python to automate the comparison of Next Generation 9-1-1 (NG911) roads and address points.
highlights: Designed a scalable archival system, optimizing storage and retrieval of over 20TB of geospatial data.
Developed a Python tool that automated the comparison of roads and address points, ensuring compliance with new NG911 standards.

work.name: GeoBC
work.summary: During my first summer co-op at GeoBC, I developed custom tools using ArcPy and made user interfaces in ArcGIS Pro and collaborated on editing the Digital Road Atlas (DRA), vital for emergency services routing in British Columbia.
